name: MacBook Pro 16 M3 Max

desc: Industry-leading noise canceling wireless headphones with crystal clear hands-free calling.

desc: Next-generation gaming console with ultra-high-speed SSD and ray tracing support.

name: Fujifilm X100VI Camera
desc: Premium compact digital camera with 40MP sensor and classic retro design.
